title: Sign in - ANRISK
info: Please enter your ID and password to use the ANRISK™ platform. If you do not have an account, please send us an email with details of your institution and we will be in contact with you.
user-manual-info: Instructions on how to use the platform are provided in the user manual. Click on the button below to download the file.
login-info: If this is your first login, please set a new password before logging in through the email that has been sent. Please contact us if you did not receive an email.
find-id-description: Please enter the name and email address associated with your account.
account-info: If you do not have an account and would like to create one, please send us an email.

password.matches: Please enter the same password as above.

name.min: Please enter a name of at least 2 characters.

email.valid: Please enter a valid email address.

submit.error: Please try again in a moment
submit.incorrect: The id or password entered is incorrect
email-info: A verification email has been sent to the email address you entered.
If you did not receive the email, please check if your email is correct.
reset-info: Please enter the ID and email address associated with your account.
submit.reset-success: Please go to the login page and sign in with your ID and new password.

modal.submit-success-description: Thank you for your inquiry. We will review your request and contact you shortly.
modal.submit-failure-description: To submit your inquiry, please agree to our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy
duplicate: You are already connected from another device.
Would you like to disconnect from your existing device and proceed to log in?
(If it is forcibly terminated, you can connect after 5 minutes.)
password: It's been 90 days since you set your password.
To protect your valuable personal information
remember: You do not need to enter your ID and password for 30 days.
Personal information may be leaked in public places.
Please use for personal use only.

footer.address: 160, Yeoksam-ro, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea
footer.ad-blocking-message: Some features may not work if an ad-blocking extension is installed

password.title: Reset Password
first-info: For security purposes, you are required to change your password upon initial login
Please log in again after changing your password
expire-info: It has been 90 days since your last password change Please change your password again
Please login again after changing your password
change-info: Please change your password for your privacy.
It's been 3 months since I set my password.
Please change your password periodically to protect your valuable personal information.
password.password-tooltip: Combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters to create a minimum of 8 characters
password.password-confirm-error: The passwords entered do not match
password.invalid-info: If you have any problems setting your password, please contact
